meanings.sent1: The flower exserted its petals towards the sun.
meanings.sent2: She exserted her hand to shake hands with the visitor.
meanings.sent3: The toast exserted from the toaster with a pop, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His ideas exserted boldly into the realm of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The rocket exserted a plume of smoke as it launched into the sky.

meanings.sent1: The exserted tree roots created a tripping hazard on the path.
meanings.sent2: The exserted antenna on the bug's head helped it sense its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The exserted umbrella handle made it easy to spot in the crowded park.
meanings.sent4: The exserted mountain peak stood tall against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The exserted rock formation jutted out from the cliff face dramatically.

meanings.sent1: The exserted branches of the tree reached over the fence.
meanings.sent2: His exserted arm accidentally knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent3: The exserted cable dangled precariously from the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The exserted part of the iceberg was just the tip of the iceberg.
meanings.sent5: The exserted flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
